name: Shapeshifter Biker
description:
You're a shapeshifter biker, all alone in a desolated world, chased by angry ducks in black trucks. To escape, you need to collect all the Animal Powers scattered across the land, in mysterious blue boxes.

Once you collect an Animal Power, you can shapeshift into that Animal for 10 seconds maximum. Some animals destroy enemies, some are invulnerable, some are scary, some can ride through lava, other can fly, some are invisible, and other are, well, surprising.

There are 20 different animals to collect, will you catch them all ?

Shapeshifter Biker was created in less than 72 hours by Renaud Forestié for Ludum Dare #35, which theme was "Shapeshift". He's the creator of the Corgi Engine and the Infinite Runner Engine, two awesome frameworks for Unity. Give them a try!
